description:
The Kraft Heinz Company is one of the largest food and beverage companies in the world, with eight $1 billion+ brands and global sales of approximately $25 billion. We’re a globally trusted producer of high-quality, great-tasting, and nutritious foods for over 150 years. While Kraft Heinz is co-headquartered in Chicago and Pittsburgh, our brands are truly global, with products produced and marketed in over 40 countries. These beloved products include condiments and sauces, cheese and dairy, meals, meats, refreshment beverages, coffee, infant and nutrition products, and numerous other grocery products in a portfolio of more than 200 legacy and emerging brands.

We spark joy around mealtime with our iconic brands, including Kraft, Oscar Mayer, Heinz, Philadelphia, Lunchables, Velveeta, Maxwell House, Capri Sun, Ore-Ida, Kool-Aid, Jell-O, Primal Kitchen, and Classico, among others. 

No matter the brand, we’re united under one vision: To sustainably grow by delighting more consumers globally. Bringing this vision to life is our team of 37,000+ food lovers, creative thinkers, and high performers worldwide. Together, we help provide meals to those in need through our global partnership with Rise Against Hunger. We also stand committed to responsible, sustainable practices that extend to every facet of our business, our consumers, and our communities. Every day, we’re transforming the food industry with bold thinking and unprecedented results. If you share our passion – and are ready to create the future, build a legacy, and lead as a global citizen – there’s only one thing to do: join our table and let’s make life delicious!

This Veterans Day, we are taking time to celebrate, honor and thank all who have served in the U.S. Armed Forces 🎖️

Meet Carlos, a United States Army Veteran and Plant Controller at our Mason, Ohio, facility 🇺🇸

From Air Defense Artillery Specialist to Kraft Heinz leader, Carlos’s journey has been shaped by resilience, teamwork, and a commitment to impact. Today, he drives financial strategy and efficiency at the plant and is also a proud member of our Veterans BRG, where he’s helping elevate the experience for Veterans across Kraft Heinz 🤝

Read through to learn more about his story.
 
#HereAtKraftHeinz #VeteransDay #LetsMakeLifeDelicious

This October was frightfully fun! 🕸️

From celebrating our 40th anniversary in China to honoring Hispanic Heritage Month in North America, this month was packed with moments of pride and connection.

Here at Kraft Heinz, innovation is at the heart of everything we do 💪

We'd love to hear from you — what innovative ideas or projects are you most proud of? Whether it was a big project or a small but impactful idea, share your story in the comments.

#HereAtKraftHeinz #Innovation #LetsMakeLifeDelicious

This morning, we shared our Q3 earnings report. We’re seeing growth in Global Away from Home and Emerging Markets, and we have plans in place to improve performance in North America Retail. We also continue to unlock efficiencies so we can reinvest in the business and create new value for consumers. We remain confident in our long-term strategy and optimistic about our future. See our full Q3 business results here: https://bit.ly/3Aje6I1

Here's to Taurino, and 47 years of service! 🏆

Taurino has been a pillar of our Escalon, CA, facility for almost five decades — from his early days as a Tomato Sorter to his current role as Production Shift Supervisor, his journey has been marked by hard work and leadership. His commitment proves that with passion and dedication, you can build a lasting legacy 🍅

If you're interested in helping us grow the future of food, head to our careers site: https://bit.ly/3ByIfDs

Our Kraft Heinz team went the extra mile at the Chicago Marathon last weekend!
 
We proudly supported 300 runners on behalf of the Special Children's Charities. This was such an inspiring event, proving that with the right ingredients – teamwork, determination and passion – anything is possible! A huge thank you to all the runners and supporters who made this event a success.
